properties.Name: PersonalLoanType
properties.Description:
Indicates whether a personal loan is:

-  Secured 
-  Unsecured.

A secured loan is has collateral involved in the loan. The lender can repossess the collateral if secured loan is not repaid in full.

When a loan is unsecured it means there is no provision for the return or collection of the loan when payments are not made. For this reason the APR's tend to be a little higher than a Secured Loan, and the repayment period is shorter.

Columns.Name: PersonalLoanTypeId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Personal Loan Type.

Columns.Name: PersonalLoanTypeName
Columns.Description: The name of a Personal Loan Type.

Columns.Name: PersonalLoanTypeDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Personal Loan Type.

Properties.Description:
Indicates whether a personal loan is:

-  Secured 
-  Unsecured.

A secured loan is has collateral involved in the loan. The lender can repossess the collateral if secured loan is not repaid in full.

When a loan is unsecured it means there is no provision for the return or collection of the loan when payments are not made. For this reason the APR's tend to be a little higher than a Secured Loan, and the repayment period is shorter.
